website_summaries.verdict: A CC cream that leaves your skin smooth and hydrated.
pros: Ultra hydrating formula goes on smoothly and provides adequate color correction
Works well on its own or in combination with other makeup
Gives skin a subtle, healthy glow to your skin
cons: Sits at a higher price point than its competitors

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: If you have melasma it won't cover the dark spots 😞
customer_reviews.author: Yasmin

customer_reviews.title: Does not cover like the commercial at all
customer_reviews.text: Does not cover like the commercial at all! My regular foundation of Revlon photofinish covers better than this. Did not cover any of my dark spots, and looked like I hardly had any coverage. Ripoff for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Juliet Law

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Dollars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't cover anywhere NEAR as well as the infomercial demonstrated or the manufacturer would have you believe. I may have awarded it a second star because of its lightweight texture, which I felt some women would probably appreciate, but the outrageous cost prevented me from doing so; it's nowhere n-e-a-r worth its pricetag.
customer_reviews.author: isaidso

customer_reviews.title: Far less inside the container as expected.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself works well. My only complaint is that while I was squeezing some out, there was a huge air bubble, so there wasn't as much product in the container as I thought. I'm not sure if it was a production issue, or if the product I received had been tested prior. Just to be sure, I will order from a different vendor next time.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Provides good coverage
customer_reviews.text: This color correcting cream really does the job of smoothing out the uneven colors of my skin. I also really like that it is 50 SPF. I bought both the medium and the light colors. The medium seemed a little dark (and I do have a tan on my face since it's summer). The one complaint I have is that the cream can look a little cake-y, so you need to use it sparingly. Also, because of the cakiness and the darker color, I mix it in with a regular white moisturizer cream, and that solves the problem. The color works better for me and it doesn't look caked.
customer_reviews.author: VA JO

customer_reviews.title: Way over priced, and very thick, hard to apply evenly
customer_reviews.text: I took off 2 stars. 1 due to cost, for what it is, and the small amount you get, it is WAY overpriced. The 2nd star I took off because this is SO thick its hard to apply and get even. Ive tried with and without primer underneath. Ive tried with fingertips, and with brush. Its so thick its just really difficult to apply it and have it look even across your face. I probably will not order again, but will try their 50SPF powder cc.
customer_reviews.author: kjm27434

customer_reviews.title: I use a much cheaper product and covers better than this
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't cover dark spots under the eye...I use a much cheaper product and covers better than this. I wouldn't recommend buy Wet n Wild it will give you better coverage
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Birkholz

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it was the foundation I was looking for ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it was the foundation I was looking for but the tubes were much smaller than I expected, which was my fault. I will make sure I order a larger oz. size next time.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Hargrove

customer_reviews.title: One product does many things
customer_reviews.text: I love this and have used it for the last 5 or more years. It is a sunscreen and a moisturizer in one. It also gives s little coverage that evens out skin discoloration. It is also good for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: jmk

customer_reviews.title: This product is wonderful. Although decided to go with the IT illuminator ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful. Although decided to go with the IT illuminator cc cream formula. Like the glow and purchased it in tan. Wonderful light coverage. Does not budge. Water resistant. Great for summer days. I don't wear foundation but this is a natural finish with slight glow tint.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: My Bare Minerals makeup does a better job covering my red cheeks and age spots
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it no stars I would. The infomercial is a total lie. This does not cover age spots or tattoos. My Bare Minerals makeup does a better job covering my red cheeks and age spots. I can't believe I fell for this because I knew it sounded too good to be true. It was not true. Please don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Bob

customer_reviews.title: Amazing coverage!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this stuff! The coverage is excellent, fine lines and wrinkles are minimal, discoloration and uneven skin tone is left flawless. It is buildable as well. The only issue I have with it is the price haha. It is very well worth the money, I just wish there were an option to buy a larger tube. I have never received so many compliments on my skin :-)
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Only had about a half of tube but unfortunately I still used it because I was super excited to try it
customer_reviews.text: Bottle was leaking a bit when I received it, Only had about a half of tube but unfortunately I still used it because I was super excited to try it! Liked the product only used it twice so far! I used my friends and hers was perfect same color and everything this one did not seem to go on the same I don't know if air got in it or what?
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Product really works!
customer_reviews.text: I love the actual makeup! It feels like i don't have any makeup on and the coverage is awesome. I have rosacea and this is the first product of many that i've used that actually did cover my redness etc. However, the packaging left much to be desired. It came completely torn up and the only reason I went ahead and used it was it came sealed at the lid.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Best foundation!
customer_reviews.text: The best foundation with sunscreen! You will love it! Moisturizer, great coverage all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes

customer_reviews.title: A GOOD THING IN A VERY SMALL PACKAGE, TOO SMALL FOR PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. It’s one of my all time favorites. The 3 stars are for the value. The tube is quite small for the price. It’s more like a sample size.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Presscott

customer_reviews.title: It Cosmetics Your Skin But Better CC Cream with SPF 50 Medium 0.406 Ounce Travel Size
customer_reviews.text: my sister raves about this product she loves it, for me it feels a bit heavy , but coverage is good, I don't like the fact that for me it is a bit expensive.
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great Foundation
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this foundation a year ago. Great coverage. My daughter tried it and she loves it too. I purchased this size last November, and it lasted five months. I love this foundation!
customer_reviews.author: Flash

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: I really like foundation. It covers well and don't need a whole lot. I am 55, so I do have red areas on my skin or little veins showing in some areas. This does a good job of covering that up and giving me an even skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: ColdCountry

customer_reviews.title: One for home and one to go!
customer_reviews.text: This was a reorder of a make-up product I like, so I'm very happy with it. It's nice that it comes in a travel size.
customer_reviews.author: Mart's notes

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect cc cream👌
customer_reviews.text: It's so nice on skin with high coverage.it's kind of lightless foundation.I really like it but I wish it was little cheaper for using everyday.🙃😔
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Probably for younger people
customer_reviews.text: It's too pale. Evened skin tone but set in my pores and lines and wrinkles. I might add moisturizer and try again.
customer_reviews.author: hetherr

customer_reviews.title: Does not cover like it shows in commercials
customer_reviews.text: Does not cover like it shows in commercials. Makes my face look cakey, whether I use a little or a lot. Not happy with it. Won't buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Judy Campau

customer_reviews.title: Smells weird / too expensive
customer_reviews.text: It's ok but smells terrible. The coverage is pretty good but I cannot stand the weird scent. This is why I cannot give higher than 3 stars because for being a so expensive product it should be either odorless or have a pleasant scent
customer_reviews.author: Marimer

customer_reviews.title: Not the size advertised
customer_reviews.text: Received the 0.135 oz version!! Really? This is not even travel size, this is basically a sample! A 23$ sample!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Weight and Coverage CC CREAM
customer_reviews.text: Really great CC CREAM. What they say about IT skin products is really true - it makes your skin look better even when you remove your make-up. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Even "Better"
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best product ever! It's worth every penny as a little goes a long way and the coverage is definitely 100%. I love using this along with their concealer. Both products and all products from It Cosmetics are great in price and products. I definitely recommend this product for any women who suffer from roscea, freckles and uneven skin tones. Definitely a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Judes67

customer_reviews.title: Full cover but don't exist
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like what it promised full cover in my opinion nit worse the $ no cover
customer_reviews.author: manuela c.

customer_reviews.title: Great light coverage- no creasing
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for months (had sample). I'm sold- great coverage without heavy layer or greasing. I did go a shade darker than normal.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this line of cosmetics and would definitely recommend this seller to purchase from.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It covers very good, but I thought it was going to work ...
customer_reviews.text: It covers very good, but I thought it was going to work a miracle after I watched the info mercial on TV. It was very good, just not great, and the money it costs doesnt justify the product.;
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Whipp

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Does not really say what it does. Leaves marks and cracks after wearing it all day😕
customer_reviews.author: Kristina T

customer_reviews.title: Coverage is perfect. Not too much not too little
customer_reviews.text: Coverage is perfect. Not too much not too little. It's definitely buildable in my opinion if u wanted to use it as a heavier foundation instead of just a daytime CC foundation.
customer_reviews.author: blake

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like the product becasue the bye bye undereye concealer is ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like the product becasue the bye bye undereye concealer is the best! i never get breakouts but with this CC cream I did.
customer_reviews.author: An

customer_reviews.title: Love this makeup!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this makeup. I squeeze about a dime size on the back of my hand and I use a brush that’s made for liquid makeup. In circular motion I apply to my whole face. For ladies over 50, which I’m 59. Don’t over use, and don’t use powder!!
customer_reviews.author: Yaya

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't live up to its claims!
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy..even using very little. I like a more natural look.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Hart

customer_reviews.title: the tube is half full
customer_reviews.text: I like the CC cream foundation but the quantity of CC cream in the tube is not what it should be.
customer_reviews.author: R.R.

customer_reviews.title: Summer weather makeup
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use and blends well with skin tones. Easy to apply. Holds up to summer weather.
customer_reviews.author: AppBean

customer_reviews.title: Terrific for any age.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for older skin. Something new for this old gal.lol
customer_reviews.author: Marie Haines

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: works just like any other foundation would. nothing extra special. not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: V. FILANOSKY

customer_reviews.title: Combined with the under eye concealer great coverage.
customer_reviews.text: This works well for redness. Combined with the under eye concealer great coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would cover ,but go on sheer. Not so. Very heavy. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: It covers.
customer_reviews.text: Full coverage. I have some scarring. It covered that completely. Also some sun damage. Covered completely. It's an amazing foundation and I've told all my friends about it. I will be ordering it again. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Candi N.

customer_reviews.title: it was just a little too light for summer use but i love the coverage
customer_reviews.text: i will order this again, it was just a little too light for summer use but i love the coverage. At the end of the day my skin looks great
customer_reviews.author: stacy Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Super sensitive with large pores and this is great
customer_reviews.text: First sunscreen, moisturizer and cover-up I'd ever used that has not broken my skin out. Super sensitive with large pores and this is great!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie Palmieri

customer_reviews.title: OVERPRICED
customer_reviews.text: Good product but price is extremely great for the amount that you get. QVC price for the same product is much less per amount.
customer_reviews.author: Willie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not any better than any other product out there. Doesn't cover as well as it should. Nothing special.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Since the medium color is very light, I use ...
customer_reviews.text: Since the medium color is very light, I use it for a cover underneath my regular foundation. Needs to have more shades.
customer_reviews.author: betme

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Tried this product as a sample from Sephora and loved it! Got it from Amazon and it's exactly what I want. I've used Bobby Brown, Christian Dior, and Beauty Counter before and this is my favorite. I've always used tinted moisturizers, so with being new to CC creams, I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Flawless!
customer_reviews.text: Love this for sunscreen and makeup in one. Great for those who spend a lot of time outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Brennan

customer_reviews.title: It smells so good like lemon
customer_reviews.text: It smells so good like lemon, but the coverage is not as good as the infomercials make it seem. I do love that it feels like you are not wearing makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like this on the market. Always come back to it. My everyday "foundation"
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I thought.
customer_reviews.text: The color wasnt what I expected. It didn't work like commercial said it would.
customer_reviews.author: Addie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: horrible
customer_reviews.text: boy what a rip off, horrible product doesn't work at all and the money wow awful
customer_reviews.author: regina lombardi

customer_reviews.title: I do not like to put on more cream because it will make ...
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping it will cover most of my freckles but the medium is too light. I do not like to put on more cream because it will make your face looks too thick. The price is too high to pay for a little tube. It will not last me very long so I save it for special occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It didn't cover like it said it would and that was very disappointing. And it didn't wear well.
customer_reviews.author: Celia

customer_reviews.title: IT Products - good find!
customer_reviews.text: Performs as advertised on TV - light to put on but covers as a heavier product would. Color blends nicely. Too soon to see any results on skins improvements as it boasts but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie M

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that this would not emphasize my lines but it does. I put it together with a little cold cream and it came out better
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Not As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: It was a decent makeup but NOT a full coverage makeup like it was stated in advertising. Very disappointed in the coverage of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nelda P. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Expensive!
customer_reviews.text: Very tiny bottle. I like the way it works but too expensive I won't order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice and creamy, goes on easily, I'd buy it again, wish it were a bit lighter
customer_reviews.author: B. Piazza

customer_reviews.title: I like this product for coverage but it runs on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this product for coverage but it runs on the warmer tone side so if you have an olive skin tone like I do you may end up looking orange.
customer_reviews.author: Makala V.

customer_reviews.title: ... dispute an item however in this case I feel like you should know
customer_reviews.text: I never write to dispute an item however in this case I feel like you should know, my make up has a very noxious smell. I put it on and it burned my face. It just smells like bad meat?
customer_reviews.author: gnat

customer_reviews.title: This product is great. Very convenient to purchase through Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. Very convenient to purchase through Amazon. I don't live near a store that sells it but I did test it out at a store that had it before I bought it. Stays on throughout the day and just need a touchup at night rather than redoing my whole face. It feels great and has staying power. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy2Buy11

customer_reviews.title: Even Skin
customer_reviews.text: This product makes my skin look even and beautiful. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Flower

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very thick and did not smooth out over face. Made my face look flaky and cakey looking
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IT
customer_reviews.text: Good product....much too small ... needs to be larger in size
customer_reviews.author: Bendquilter

customer_reviews.title: Too costly for the amount
customer_reviews.text: This product was way too little product for the price. Also was not the color I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy

customer_reviews.title: I like the fee
customer_reviews.text: I like the fee, texture and color of IT CC cream. I purchased the travel size initially and will ordering a regular size tube. Thank you IT!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This product has no coverage of any imperfection. It doesn't last and makes my skin feels greasy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: it melted off my face by noon, and I didn't even sweat
customer_reviews.author: CathyR.S

customer_reviews.title: Works great and a little does go a long way
customer_reviews.text: Works great and a little does go a long way. I'm Romanian so my skin tone is hard to reach but it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Carolee 💖

customer_reviews.title: Does not cover like infomercial claims
customer_reviews.text: After watching the infomercial on this, I was really disappointed. This does not cover like they say at all. I won't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I have just used it once. It's much lighter than the smashbox cc cream I have been using. The coverage is comparable.
customer_reviews.author: Neha Arya

customer_reviews.title: Great for rosacea!
customer_reviews.text: Great for rosacea, which I’d gotten little darker shade. Reviews though said next color too dark.
customer_reviews.author: polly s johansen

customer_reviews.title: Fantabulous!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cream! Just a little goes a long way and it's amazing how light the feel is with the coverage it provides!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Bartek

customer_reviews.title: Covers up imperfections and it's breathable even in the heat!
customer_reviews.text: I am loving it and it doesn't make my cellphone smudgy! Hides botchy skin.
customer_reviews.author: phoenix Blue

customer_reviews.title: Just expensive make up.
customer_reviews.text: I was definately taken in by the commercials, but this is just expensive make up. I will return to my Clairins foundation. If you have a make up that works for you, stay with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Black

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This CC cream is amazing. Makes my skin look much younger and I get great coverage from the sun. It goes on great with a sponge. I use this as my foundation and don't need anything else!

customer_reviews.title: Thick and drying.
customer_reviews.text: Coverage on dark spots. discolorations. Shade too yellow. Disappointed. Won't use it again.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Color was perfect, goes on smooth, but it did not hide blemishes as advertised.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great
customer_reviews.text: Better than many of the products out there! It smells a little off for about a minute and than it disappears. Also I have moderate rosacea and it does a pretty great job covering the redness, and does not agitate or inflame my rosacea. Love the amount of sun protection it gives.
customer_reviews.author: Molly M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it but I do intend on going up one color for the summer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: After viewing the infomercial I expected better coverage. I bought just your skin but better ...
customer_reviews.text: After viewing the infomercial I expected better coverage. I bought just your skin but better CC cream in medium. I have not been pleased. I only wanted the smaller amount in case it did not work well. We just recently retired and I don't want to add to my collection of skin products that have not worked well for me. I wish it had lived up to the hype. I rarely give a negative review for any products and am sorry it was necessary with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sara A. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this makeup. A little goes a long way. Wears well.

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Did not work at all like it did on TV. Very disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this concealer. It feels light going on. Perfect coverage.

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage although a little thick nothing a little lotion ...
customer_reviews.text: This makeup does what they said it does. Good coverage although a little thick nothing a little lotion can't fix.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hofmann

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, it did do the best coverage out ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, it did do the best coverage out of any other product I have ever tried. Covering dark scars did need a couple applications and wasn't completely covered, but again alot better than anything I have used b4

customer_reviews.title: Pricy.
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. Good coverage, texture all in one process. Awfully small for the price though.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am a happy customer and I love how light it feels and the coverage

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much, the only problem is that you need to put on quite a lot to cover your skin flaws. It does look very natural on your skin though. I will keep buying it!

customer_reviews.title: Totally a waste of
customer_reviews.text: Did not cover the way it was advertised to do. Totally a waste of money

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: It's really as good as it claims. Great coverage but not heavy. Or greasy. Or drying. If in doubt on the shade, err toward purchasing the darker tone. Lots of compliments since I started using it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the travel size
customer_reviews.text: Love the travel size, perfect for the short summer season with a tan. If you haven't tried IT cosmetics yet you're missing out. I never thought I would move away from mineral makeup, but this is light and the coverage is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: John Hart

product_meta.title: It Cosmetics Your Skin But Better CC Cream with SPF 50 Medium 0.406 Ounce Travel Size
product_meta.description: This highly pigmented multi-tasking beauty miracle truly covers everything, will not crease or crack in fine lines, and gives you a healthy, Your Skin But Better glow. Paraben-free and SPF 50+ UVA/UVB Broad Spectrum, Physical Only, Non-Chemical Sunscreen. Developed with leading plastic surgeons, Your Skin But Better CC+ Cream with SPF 50+ is truly a multi-tasking beauty miracle. Its your SPF 50+ UVA/UVB Physical only sunscreen that protects against the rays that both burn your skin and age your skin. CC+ is infused with cutting edge Anti-Aging technology and is clinically proven to improve skin texture, brightness and increase skin hydration by 79%. The Anti-Aging hydrating formula is infused with Peptides, Niacin, Algae, Vitamins A, C, B, E, Hyaluronic Acid and Hydrolyzed Collagen along with Antioxidants and exotic natural botanicals for long-term brightening and color-correcting benefits. Highly pigmented and covers absolutely everything and anything. Scientific breakthrough - clinically proven multi-tasking skin care, coverage and protection all-in-one. SPF 50+ Broad Spectrum UVA/UVB non-chemical physical only sunscreen.
feature_bullets: It Cosmetics Your Skin But Better CC Cream with SPF 50+
